definition: to tear something or to become torn, often suddenly or violently
to remove something quickly or violently, often by pulling it
to copy sound or video files from a website or CD on to a computer
to change text or images into a form in which they can be displayed on a screen or printed

to do something or to allow something to happen as fast as possible
to speak or do something with great force, enthusiasm, etc. and without control
to destroy something; to criticize somebody very strongly
to destroy the most important part or aspect of something
to attack somebody very violently
the practice of doing experiments on live animals for medical or scientific research
to sleep longer than you intended
the act of treating somebody/something as less important than somebody/something else
not expressed or done in a direct way
sloping at an angle
greater or less than 90°
the belief that particular events happen in a way that cannot be explained by reason or science; the belief that particular events bring good or bad luck
the place where something happens, especially something unpleasant
an event or a situation that you see, especially one of a particular type
a part of a film, play or book in which the action happens in one place or is of one particular type
one of the small sections that a play or an opera is divided into
a particular area of activity or way of life and the people who are part of it
a view that you see
a painting, drawing, or photograph of a place and the things that are happening there
a loud, angry argument, especially one that happens in public and is embarrassing
in the part of a theatre, etc. that the public does not usually see
in a way that people in general are not aware of
not the type of thing that somebody likes or enjoys doing
to create a situation in which something can easily happen or develop
to give somebody the information and details they need in order to understand what comes next
to work in a particular way
to use or control a machine or make it work
to manage a business, organization or service
to work, especially in a particular way or from a particular place
to be used or working; to use something or make it work
to cut open somebody’s body in order to remove a part that has a disease or to repair a part that is damaged
to be involved in military activities in a place
to make something/somebody look more attractive by decorating it or them with something
a temporary building used at public events and exhibitions
a building next to a sports ground, used by players and people watching the game
a large building used for sports or entertainment
a building that is meant to be more beautiful than useful, built as a shelter in a park or used for concerts and dances
an order given to a person or an animal
an instruction given to a computer
control and authority over a situation or a group of people
a part of an army, air force, etc. that is organized and controlled separately; a group of officers who give orders
your knowledge of something; your ability to do or use something, especially a language
if you have a skill or an amount of something at your command, you are able to use it well and completely
to be ready to obey somebody
used to say that you are ready to do whatever somebody asks you to do
a small computer that is easy to carry, with a large touch screen and usually without a physical keyboard
a small round solid piece of medicine that you swallow
an amount of a substance in a small, round, solid piece
a flat piece of stone that has words written on it, especially one that has been fixed to a wall in memory of an important person or event
a piece of soap
a number of pieces of paper for writing or drawing on, that are fastened together at one edge
held or fixed in position securely; difficult to move, open or separate
fitting closely to your body and sometimes uncomfortable
difficult to manage with because there is not enough
very strict and hard to resist, avoid, etc.
stretched or pulled so that it cannot stretch much further
with things or people packed closely together, leaving little space between them
looking or sounding anxious, upset or angry
feeling painful or uncomfortable because of illness or emotion
having a close relationship with somebody else or with other people
curving suddenly rather than gradually
with runners, teams, etc. that seem to be equally good
not wanting to spend much money; not generous
drunk
not allowing the substance mentioned to enter
in a difficult situation
to control somebody/something carefully or strictly
to organize something in a very efficient way, controlling other people very closely
to make a statement that something happened or that something is true, especially as a witness in court
to say that you believe something is true because you have evidence of it
to express your belief in God publicly
red-brown clay that has been baked but not glazed, used for making pots, etc.
a red-brown colour
too satisfied with yourself or with a situation, so that you do not feel that any change is necessary; showing or feeling complacency
looking or feeling too pleased about something you have done or achieved
too pleased with yourself or your own achievements
dark red-brown in colour
the position or the authority of the Pope
the period of time when a particular Pope is in power
to tend to think or behave in a particular way; to make somebody do this
to bend your head forward, especially as a sign of agreement, welcome, etc.
to lean or slope in a particular direction; to make something lean or slope
to waste time not doing anything useful or important
in or connected with a suburb
boring and ordinary
an evergreen forest tree with leaves like needles
the pale soft wood of the pine tree, used in making furniture, etc.
any member of the family that includes modern humans and great apes, as well as earlier creatures that no longer exist from which modern humans evolved (= developed)
